column1: Funeral services will be held on Thursday
column4: at 1:00 p.m. at the Zion United Methodist Church in Danube. The Rev. Dean Nosek will officiate. Burial will be in Fairview Cemetery in Renville. Visitation will be Thursday from noon until the 1:00 p.m. service at the church in Danube. Arrangements with Dirks-Blem Funeral Service
